name: Shuffle Dice
description:
=== Controls ===

  • Click and drag the mouse to launch dice.

=== Tip ===

  • As the die roll they will count upwards to 6 before returning to 1. Use this knowledge to decide how hard you want to hit the other dice on the board.

Submission for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam. 

Theme: "Roll of the Dice"

Sound from Zapsplat.com
